messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group with 15 scholars. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Raj is connected to Nisha, Ian, Sara, and Kim. Jing is connected to  Reza, Moin, Pari, and Max. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Nisha is connected to Ian, Sara, and Max. Reza is connected to Moin, and Pari. Kim is connected to Pam. Ian is connected to Sara, and Max. Moin is connected to Pari. Puja is connected to Pam. Sara is connected to Max. You have been told that Kim is donating 50 books and Max is donating 10 books. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person who is donating the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

Remember, you can only take books from one person and only once.

Pari:  You are a factory manager, and you need to set up a production line for the items listed in the table below. You can set up a production line for any number of items and there is no limit to the number of times you can use the same production line. For example, if you have five items A,B,C,D,E and two production lines, A->B->C->D->E, you can use both of them to produce the first item A, the second item B, and the third item C. But, you can not use the second production line to produce item A again. Please tell me the total number of production lines you need.

You have been given the final report of the audit of a company. Please find out how many of the employees have done a fraud. For this, check if the total salary of a department is more than the sum of the salary of all the employees in the department.

This is a collection of information. Please find out if there is a company that has less than 100 employees but more than 90 employees.

You are a human resource manager. You have been given

You have been told that Amir is now connected to Pam. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person who is donating the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

But, you can not use the second production line to produce item A again. Please tell me the total number of production lines you need.
